<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Script to set property change_planned_date_from_actual_for_manual to true</description>
        <name>Set Manual Project Property</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('pm_project');
gr.addQuery('calculation_type','manual');
gr.setLimit(1);
gr.query();

if (gr.next()){
	gs.log('Manual Project Found Changing Property to true');
	var grProperty = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
	grProperty.addQuery('name','com.snc.project.change_planned_date_from_actual_for_manual');
	grProperty.query();
	while (grProperty.next()){
		gs.log('Changing property change_planned_date_from_actual_for_manual to true');
		grProperty.setValue('value','true');
		grProperty.update();
	}
}
	]]></script>
